?Game description
In the late 1980s, a man who has lost his job has resolved to live in a certain world of gambling. Somewhat confident in his skill, he enters into the world of mahjong. There he learns of the existence of something called "Cheating mahjong." In this world of mahjong, which is controlled by fate, such that it is commonly said luck is seven while skill is three, there are players who boast of their invincibility. In the various mahjong halls where the invincibility takes up the challenge, a variety of mahjong players wait for him. In the first mahjong hall "Jongjong Hall" he is able to make a partner of an opponent that he defeats and he forms a team with that partner and is able to use new cheating techniques! Go on to use the skills of tile distribution and self-draw tiles and in a rough and ever-changing life, defeat strong enemies who similarly make use of trickery, aiming to become the peerless "Invincible Mahjong Player"!
